amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance (LIHEAP) program and the Weatherization Assistance program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the low-income home energy assistance program and the weatherization assistance program by $22,000,000. The amendment offsets these increases by cutting the bill's appropriation for Health and Human Services departmental management by $26,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 305 - 114 (Roll no. 427).
